name: cssexy
description: A tool for live editing and syncing CSS directly from the browser to your source files

scripts.vite-dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "PORT=5555 vite" "NODE_ENV=development BROWSER_PORT=5555 PORT=8888 nodemon server/server.js"
scripts.cssxe:dev: TARGET_DIR=$TARGET_DIR npm run getTargetPort && TARGET_DIR=$TARGET_DIR npm run vite-dev
scripts.dev-cdp: concurrently "PORT=5555 npm run startRemoteChromeJs" "npm run vite-dev"
scripts.dev-sh: PORT=5555 npm run startRemoteChrome && npm run vite-dev
scripts.cssxe:prod: npm run getTargetPort && TARGET_DIR=$TARGET_DIR npm run prod
scripts.prod-sh: npm run build && PORT=8888 npm run startRemoteChromeJs && npm run start

author: pandawhale
